title: jon_flop_boat
author: jon_flop_boat
content: Just like it says on the tin: half a bitcoin, silver, 2013.I'll be up front with you: I don't know anything about bitcoin or, specifically, this coin.Â  I got the coin from a crypto enthusiast, but I never got into crypto myself.I know it's worth half a bitcoin at a floor, and an auction seems like the best way to find the ceiling. ðŸ˜ŽIs it series 2 or series 3?Â  I don't know.Â  You'd think this would be easy to find out; it's not.Â  The pictures are not helpful, and the wiki doesn't list the differences comprehensively.Chain of custody?Â  Couldn't tell you.Â  It is currently mine and that's ~as far back as I can trace custody (gonna leave the previous owner out of this).Grade?Â  Uuuhhhhh look at it.Â  As far as I know, it's never -- not one single time -- been in a protective case, and I can tell you for a fact that it's been touched by ungloved human hands.Â  I am touching it while I write this post.If you've got fun facts about Bitcoin, this Casascius dude, or collectors' coins, I'm all ears. ðŸ¦»Here's pictures: https://imgur.com/a/fkJSMZLIf you want more pictures of the coin for reasons that are unfathomable to me, I can take more, as long as they're not under the seal.Here's "verification" that it's still loaded (I don't know how reliable this site, maybe you do): https://casascius.uberbills.com/?address=1Agj3S8Rr2QFW4m2mLFiR6JHG2zrbaUDj6Starting bid is 0.6 BTC, 0.1 BTC increments.I'll shut bidding down at 11:59PM PST on 26 September 2023.Buyer pays escrow fees. ðŸ’¸

comments.author: Eclipse33
comments.body: Quote from: tenakha on December 19, 2023, 03:03:43 PMIs this still for sale?This coin was sold on collectables section several months ago.
